magnate.logic

Class Token

  • java.lang.Object
    • magnate.logic.Token
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    java.io.Serializable

    public class Token
extends java.lang.Object
implements java.io.Serializable
    This class reprensents a set of the diferent types of suits/tokens. Is used in cards, player tokens and deeds.
    Version:
    1.0
    Author:
    Filipe
    See Also:
    Serialized Form

      • get_keys

        public java.lang.String[] get_keys()
        This method gets all the keys USED in the set. (Usefull for card suits.) (This return can be used as initialization or set.)
        Returns:
        array with all the keys.
